title: Hated it
review: The only part I liked in this dreadful movie is when those pain in the neck kids got killed.My biggest problem is that this story sounded just like something I heard at summer camp -- when I was 10 years old.

title: Disappointed
review: I was disappointed of this movie.I went in expecting a tortured soul asking himself why he lived through this horrible accident. I wasn't expecting so much of the superhero comic book referencesIf I had perhaps I wouldn't have gone in with such high expectations.
